page.title: 15EDUCATION
page.content: In September I am going to Whinney Hill Comprehensive which is in Durham but really I do not want to go because I like this school better.Also the worst thing is that we have to wear a school uniform.The girls have to wear a navy blazer (or black),a white blouse,but with that blouse you must wear a school tie.With a blue blouse you cannot wear a tie.The best thing that you can do is C.D.T.,which is woodwork,metalwork and cookery.Also you have two seperate yards one for the girls and the other one is the boys.First time I did not want to go but now I can't wait,the girls have to wear a flared skirt but all the in our class are not wearing one.Sometimes in Whinney Hill they have discos.you can get the uniform from Parkins and R.M.K & Fashions.
